title: Bug 120315: The 'display' property of an item set to 'none' has no effect in the new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item remains visible in the generated PDF document.
EB: In the PDF preview, the item with the display property set to 'none' should be completely hidden and not visible in the generated PDF document.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Generate a PDF document with the modified item.
4. Preview the PDF document and observe that the item is still visible.
